message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 9-1-1, translated into en
data:
The indicator “Number of passengers transported and rotated” is one of the indicators corresponding to the global SDG indicator “ 9.1.2. Passenger and freight volumes, by mode of transport”. The content of the Vietnamese and global indicators is the same, so the Vietnamese data warrant international comparison.

The scope of the Vietnamese target covers the global target. The global indicator only counts passenger turns. Vietnam includes both transporting and rotating passengers.
